title: S3 ACL misconfiguration

profile.name: Legal Robot
profile.about: Automated legal document review using artificial intelligence

vulnerability_information:
**Summary**:

Legal Robot's s3 bucket [**legalrobot.com**] is misconfigured. The ACL allows me to _access_ and _copy_ **all files**. This means that I could go through and copy all the media files on the s3 bucket.  I did not attempt to _delete_ any files as I did not want to go too far and affect your operations.

**Steps to Reproduce**:

1) Generate a random AWS key from the AWS Console
2) Perform the following proof-of-concept:
```
$ aws s3 ls s3://legalrobot
                      PRE email/
                      PRE video/
2015-12-28 21:39:20    536901 Dan-sq-gray.jpg
2015-12-28 21:39:21     546125 Dan-sq.jpg
2015-10-06 21:35:54     363060 Gizmo-Foldable.pdf
2016-02-26 12:37:45      22945 Megan.jpg
2015-12-08 01:58:52     420926 logo_huge.png
2015-12-08 01:59:04      14714 logo_text_huge.png

copy: aws s3 cp s3://legalrobot/video/meeting-room/MP4/Meeting-Room.mp4
```
I've noticed that this particular video file is being played in the background of your homepage. 

**Remediation**:

Update your ACL to the proper configuration, preventing other users' from potentially modifying or accessing your s3 bucket.
vulnerability_information_html:
Summary:

Legal Robot's s3 bucket [legalrobot.com] is misconfigured. The ACL allows me to access and copy all files. This means that I could go through and copy all the media files on the s3 bucket. I did not attempt to delete any files as I did not want to go too far and affect your operations.

Steps to Reproduce:

1) Generate a random AWS key from the AWS Console
2) Perform the following proof-of-concept:

$ aws s3 ls s3://legalrobot
                      PRE email/
                      PRE video/
2015-12-28 21:39:20    536901 Dan-sq-gray.jpg
2015-12-28 21:39:21     546125 Dan-sq.jpg
2015-10-06 21:35:54     363060 Gizmo-Foldable.pdf
2016-02-26 12:37:45      22945 Megan.jpg
2015-12-08 01:58:52     420926 logo_huge.png
2015-12-08 01:59:04      14714 logo_text_huge.png

copy: aws s3 cp s3://legalrobot/video/meeting-room/MP4/Meeting-Room.mp4

I've noticed that this particular video file is being played in the background of your homepage.

Remediation:

Update your ACL to the proper configuration, preventing other users' from potentially modifying or accessing your s3 bucket.

activities.message:
Hi Legal Robot team.  Just checking in on this to see if had any time to take a look at this report I filed over two weeks ago.

Happy Holidays!
activities.markdown_message:
Hi Legal Robot team. Just checking in on this to see if had any time to take a look at this report I filed over two weeks ago.

Happy Holidays!

activities.message:
Thanks for the report. This is actually intentional behavior, as we mention in our program policy:

> Some S3 buckets simply hold logos, videos, and other assets which are intentionally publicly accessible (like legalrobot.s3.amazonaws.com).

So, I'm going to close this report as informative.

Somewhat related: we're planning to retire this S3 bucket since we moved to CloudFlare, which caches our static assets and removes the need for this bucket.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks for the report. This is actually intentional behavior, as we mention in our program policy:

Some S3 buckets simply hold logos, videos, and other assets which are intentionally publicly accessible (like legalrobot.s3.amazonaws.com).

So, I'm going to close this report as informative.

Somewhat related: we're planning to retire this S3 bucket since we moved to CloudFlare, which caches our static assets and removes the need for this bucket.
